docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Nov. 4 -- The underdeveloped countries are seizing the occasion of the general debate of the United Nations General Assembly's Economic and Financial Committee to air their complaints about the downward trend in world prices of basic commodities such as cotton and wool.

docs.snippet: Steve Kuk, a former backfield star at Colgate and the head coach at Blair Academy, has to be a perfectionist. The reason is Fred (Scrap) Johnson, a top lineman at Lehigh fifty years ago, who retired as a member of Blair's faculty in 1947.
docs.lead_paragraph: Steve Kuk, a former backfield star at Colgate and the head coach at Blair Academy, has to be a perfectionist. The reason is Fred (Scrap) Johnson, a top lineman at Lehigh fifty years ago, who retired as a member of Blair's faculty in 1947.

docs.snippet: British sterling and the Canadian dollar turned sharply lower last week. After a good start on Monday on a carry-over of the rising trend of the preceding week, rates ebbed steadily when trading was resumed on Wednesday following Tuesday's elections....
docs.lead_paragraph: British sterling and the Canadian dollar turned sharply lower last week. After a good start on Monday on a carry-over of the rising trend of the preceding week, rates ebbed steadily when trading was resumed on Wednesday following Tuesday's elections. Markets were extremely active, especially as the week worked toward its close.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended Nov. 7, 1952.

docs.snippet: A number of steamship lines transporting cargo from Argentina, Brazil, Uruguay and Paraguay to New York have instituted a new schedule of terminal charges here, effective Dec. 1. The companies are subscribers to what is known as the East Coast South...
docs.lead_paragraph: A number of steamship lines transporting cargo from Argentina, Brazil, Uruguay and Paraguay to New York have instituted a new schedule of terminal charges here, effective Dec. 1. The companies are subscribers to what is known as the East Coast South America/New York Free Time Agreement.
